actions.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 225 (Roll no. 587).
Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Gosar to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Gosar to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 225 (Roll no. 587).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to require the Federal Government to track the total number, cost, and time required for each environmental review of transportation projects when reporting the status of these projects to the public.
purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require the federal government to track the total number, cost, and time required for each environmental review of transportation projects when reporting the status of these projects to the public.
